00100 namespace point_count_internal {
00101 
00102 template <  typename PointDataTreeT,
00103             typename ValueIterT,
00104             typename FilterFromLeafT>
00105 struct PointCountOp
00106 {
00107     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<const PointDataTreeT>    LeafManagerT;
00108     typedef IndexIterTraits<PointDataTreeT, ValueIterT>         IndexIteratorFromLeafT;
00109     typedef typename IndexIteratorFromLeafT::Iterator           IndexIterator;
00110     typedef typename FilterFromLeafT::Filter                    Filter;
00111     typedef FilterIndexIter<IndexIterator, Filter>              Iterator;
00112 
00113     PointCountOp(const FilterFromLeafT& filterFromLeaf)
00114         : mFilterFromLeaf(filterFromLeaf) { }
00115 
00116     Index64 operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range, Index64 size) const {
00117 
00118         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf = range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00119             IndexIterator indexIterator(IndexIteratorFromLeafT::begin(*leaf));
00120             Filter filter(mFilterFromLeaf.fromLeaf(*leaf));
00121             Iterator iter(indexIterator, filter);
00122             size += iterCount(iter);
00123         }
00124 
00125         return size;
00126     }
00127 
00128     static Index64 join(Index64 size1, Index64 size2) {
00129         return size1 + size2;
00130     }
00131 
00132 private:
00133     const FilterFromLeafT& mFilterFromLeaf;
00134 }; // struct PointCountOp
00135 
00136 
00137 template <typename PointDataTreeT, typename FilterFromLeafT, typename ValueIterT>
00138 Index64 threadedFilterPointCount(   const PointDataTreeT& tree,
00139                                     const FilterFromLeafT& filterFromLeaf)
00140 {
00141     typedef point_count_internal::PointCountOp< PointDataTreeT, ValueIterT, FilterFromLeafT> PointCountOp;
00142 
00143     typename tree::LeafManager<const PointDataTreeT> leafManager(tree);
00144     const PointCountOp pointCountOp(filterFromLeaf);
00145     return tbb::parallel_reduce(leafManager.leafRange(), Index64(0), pointCountOp, PointCountOp::join);
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 template <typename PointDataTreeT, typename FilterFromLeafT>
00150 Index64 filterPointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree,
00151                          const FilterFromLeafT& filterFromLeaf)
00152 {
00153     typedef typename PointDataTreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueAllCIter ValueIterT;
00154     return threadedFilterPointCount<  PointDataTreeT, FilterFromLeafT, ValueIterT>(tree, filterFromLeaf);
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 template <typename PointDataTreeT, typename FilterFromLeafT>
00159 Index64 filterActivePointCount( const PointDataTreeT& tree,
00160                                 const FilterFromLeafT& filterFromLeaf)
00161 {
00162     typedef typename PointDataTreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueOnCIter ValueIterT;
00163     return threadedFilterPointCount<  PointDataTreeT, FilterFromLeafT, ValueIterT>(tree, filterFromLeaf);
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 template <typename PointDataTreeT, typename FilterFromLeafT>
00168 Index64 filterInactivePointCount(   const PointDataTreeT& tree,
00169                                     const FilterFromLeafT& filterFromLeaf)
00170 {
00171     typedef typename PointDataTreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueOffCIter ValueIterT;
00172     return threadedFilterPointCount<  PointDataTreeT, FilterFromLeafT, ValueIterT>(tree, filterFromLeaf);
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 } // namespace point_count_internal
00177 
00178 
00179 template <typename PointDataTreeT>
00180 Index64 pointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree)
00181 {
00182     Index64 size = 0;
00183     for (typename PointDataTreeT::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf(); iter; ++iter) {
00184         size += iter->pointCount();
00185     }
00186     return size;
00187 }
00188 
00189 
00190 template <typename PointDataTreeT>
00191 Index64 activePointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree)
00192 {
00193     Index64 size = 0;
00194     for (typename PointDataTreeT::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf(); iter; ++iter) {
00195         size += iter->onPointCount();
00196     }
00197     return size;
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 template <typename PointDataTreeT>
00202 Index64 inactivePointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree)
00203 {
00204     Index64 size = 0;
00205     for (typename PointDataTreeT::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf(); iter; ++iter) {
00206         size += iter->offPointCount();
00207     }
00208     return size;
00209 }
00210 
00211 
00212 template <typename PointDataTreeT>
00213 Index64 groupPointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree, const Name& name)
00214 {
00215     GroupFilterFromLeaf filterFromLeaf(name);
00216     return point_count_internal::filterPointCount(tree, filterFromLeaf);
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 template <typename PointDataTreeT>
00221 Index64 activeGroupPointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree, const Name& name)
00222 {
00223     GroupFilterFromLeaf filterFromLeaf(name);
00224     return point_count_internal::filterActivePointCount(tree, filterFromLeaf);
00225 }
00226 
00227 
00228 template <typename PointDataTreeT>
00229 Index64 inactiveGroupPointCount(const PointDataTreeT& tree, const Name& name)
00230 {
00231     GroupFilterFromLeaf filterFromLeaf(name);
00232     return point_count_internal::filterInactivePointCount(tree, filterFromLeaf);
00233 }
